  • All Classes
 

Package in.co.rays.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ORSView
    ORSView interface holds the constants for all JSP view paths and Controller URLs used throughout the ORS (Online Result System) application.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseCtl
    BaseCtl is an abstract controller that provides base functionality to all controllers such as preload data, populate common fields, validate input, and manage operation constants.
    ChangePasswordCtl
    ChangePasswordCtl allows a user to change their password.
    CollegeCtl
    CollegeCtl handles Add and Update operations for the College entity.
    CollegeListCtl
    CollegeListCtl handles the display and operations for listing colleges including pagination, search, delete, and navigation.
    CourseCtl
    CourseCtl handles Course form operations like Add, Update, Reset, and Cancel.
    CourseListCtl
    CourseListCtl handles the display, search, pagination, deletion, and navigation of course records.
    ErrorCtl
    ErrorCtl handles the forwarding to the error view when an unhandled exception or error condition occurs in the application.
    FacultyCtl
    FacultyCtl handles faculty data operations like add, update, and preload for dropdowns.
    FacultyListCtl
    FacultyListCtl handles the listing, searching, pagination, and deletion operations for Faculty entities.
    ForgetPasswordCtl
    ForgetPasswordCtl handles the logic for sending the user's password to their registered email if they forget it.
    FrontController  
    GetMarksheetCtl
    GetMarksheetCtl allows the user to retrieve a student's marksheet using their Roll Number.
    LoginCtl
    LoginCtl handles user login, logout, and redirection to registration.
    MarksheetCtl
    MarksheetCtl servlet handles the operations related to adding, updating, and validating a marksheet.
    MarksheetListCtl
    MarksheetListCtl servlet class handles the operations for listing marksheet records with pagination, searching, and deletion functionalities.
    MarksheetMeritListCtl
    MarksheetMeritListCtl servlet handles the logic to display the top-scoring students (merit list) from the marksheet records.
    MyProfileCtl
    MyProfileCtl manages user profile operations like viewing and updating the profile details of the currently logged-in user.
    RoleCtl
    RoleCtl controller class handles the Create and Update operations for Role entities.
    RoleListCtl
    RoleListCtl is a controller class that handles the listing, searching, pagination, and deletion of Role records.
    StudentCtl
    StudentCtl is a controller to handle operations like adding and updating student data.
    StudentListCtl
    Controller class to handle Student List functionality.
    SubjectCtl
    Controller to handle operations for Subject such as Add, Update, Reset, Cancel.
    SubjectListCtl
    Controller to handle listing, searching, pagination, and deletion of subjects.
    TimetableCtl
    TimetableCtl handles operations for adding, updating, and validating Timetable entries.
    TimetableListCtl
    Controller class to handle operations related to Timetable List such as search, delete, pagination, etc.
    UserCtl
    Controller class to handle User operations (Add, Update).
    UserListCtl
    Controller to handle operations for listing, searching, and deleting user records.
    UserRegistrationCtl
    Controller to handle User Registration operations.
    WelcomeCtl
    Controller to handle the welcome screen.
